articles.author: Jay Harris
articles.title: Ivan Toney handed eight-month ban by FA over betting offences - The Athletic
articles.description:
Brentford and England striker Ivan Toney has been banned from football for eight months over 232 betting breaches.
The 27-year-old will not be able to play for his club or country until his suspension comes to an end on January 16, 2024.
Toney is also not all…

articles.title: Sharks are older than Saturn's rings - ZME Science
articles.description: Saturn's rings are much younger than we thought.
articles.content: Some 450 million years ago, the world was a very different place. Invertebrates, namely mollusks and arthropods, dominated the oceans. The first land plants were just emerging. Trees didn’t exist. Di… [+4078 chars]

articles.title: Found in the trash: these floating snails hang out in the ocean's garbage patch - Nature.com
articles.description: Ocean currents that collect plastic also round up sea life — this striking image shows its bubbly life raft.
